import React , { Fragment, useState }from 'react'; import DatePicker from 'react-datepicker'; import 'react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css'; import "../css/CreateMatch.css" import FileReader from './FileReader' class CreateMatch extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { gameDate: "", name: this.props.nameTeam, anotherTeam: "", myTeamHalfScore: "", anotherHalfScore: "", myTeamFinalScore: "", anotherFinalScore: "", shotOnTargetHalfOne: "", shotOnTargetHalfTwo: "", shotOFFTargetHalfOne: "", shotOFFTargetHalfTwo: "", corrnerHalfOne: "", corrnerHalfTwo: "", offsidesHalfOne: "", offsidesHalfTwo: "", tackelsHalfOne: "", tackelsHalfTwo: "", stealHalfOne: "", stealsHalfTwo: "", lostPossessionHalfOne: "", lostPossessionHalfTwo: "" } this.check = this.check.bind(this); } componentDidMount() { this.setState({gameDate : new Date().toLocaleDateString()}) } insertDeitals(name,value) { this.setState({ [name] : value}); } check() { if(this.state.errors) { alert("error") }else { console.log(JSON.stringify(this.state)); } } render() { return (

Create Match - {this.stae.gameDate}

); } }; export default CreateMatch;
